item.title: Formal groups, part 1
About
item.description: My name is Zifan Wang (王子凡). I mostly go by Atticus. As of summer 2024, I am a rising junior at MIT studying pure math, primarily interested in algebraic topology and algebraic geometry. I also dabble in physics and machine learning. In a parallel universe, I may be a guitarist, a chemist, or a writer.

item.title: Notes
item.description: Here’s the big dumpster. At some point in the future, I hope to turn this into a legible book of some sort. If you spot any mistakes, please do let me know.
